origins.gui.choose_quirk.title: Choose your Quirk.
origins.gui.view_quirk.title: This is your Quirk.
origins.gui.missing_quirk.name: Missing
origins.gui.missing_quirk.description: An error occurred. You do not have an Quirk.
origin.quirks.acid.name: Acid
origin.quirks.acid.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Acid Quirk grants the user the ability to produce and manipulate a corrosive liquid from their body, allowing for a wide variety of offensive and defensive capabilities. This quirk is highly versatile, offering both ranged and close-combat options, as well as defensive shielding.
badge.quirks.acid.move_selector: Pressing [%1$s] will go up, and [%2$s] + [%3$s] will go down.
power.quirks.acid.move_selector.name: Move Selector
power.quirks.acid.move_selector.descript:
The Move Selector allows players to choose which move to use. [Secondary]

The moves are assigned to slots as follows:

- Slot 1: Acid Shot
- Slot 2: Acid Veil
- Slot 3: Acid Layback
- Slot 4: Acidman
- Slot 5: Alma
power.quirks.acid.corrosive_liquid.name: Corrosive Liquid
power.quirks.acid.corrosive_liquid.descr:
Corrosive Liquid is the primary resource associated with the Acid Quirk. It represents the acid produced by the user and is necessary for activating and maintaining the Quirk's abilities.

The corrosive liquid the body can produce has a maximum capacity of 400 units, with the initial value starting at 0. The user passively generates corrosive liquid over time at a base rate of 2 units per second.

However, this rate is influenced by certain conditions. If the user's food level falls to 3 or below, or if their health is reduced to 30% or less of the maximum, the generation rate slows to 0.5 units per second.

The user's skin color changes in relation to the current amount of corrosive liquid available.
power.quirks.acid.acid_shot.name: Acid Shot (Slot 1)
power.quirks.acid.acid_shot.description: Launch a barrage of acid in the form of bullet-like projectiles. These droplets rain down on the target and its surroundings, melting anything they touch. [Primary]
power.quirks.acid.acid_veil.name: Acid Veil (Slot 2)
power.quirks.acid.acid_veil.description: Generate a thick wall of acid to block incoming attacks. The acid is dense enough to dissolve projectiles before they reach the user. [Primary]
power.quirks.acid.acid_layback.name: Acid Layback (Slot 3)
power.quirks.acid.acid_layback.descripti: The user releases acid from their feet, dissolving the ground beneath them to create a low-friction surface. Additionally, by grabbing a target and spinning on this surface at high speeds, the gained momentum increases the velocity and power of any projectiles launched. [Primary]
power.quirks.acid.acidman.name: Acidman (Slot 4)
power.quirks.acid.acidman.description: The user envelops their entire body in a large mass of acid, becoming a living shield. While coated in this acid, the user is highly resistant to physical damage and can melt anything that comes into contact with them. Additionally, when Acidman is activated, the corrosive liquid generation is reduced to 0.5 units per second, as the active maintenance of this ability requires more energy. [Primary]
power.quirks.acid.alma.name: Alma (Slot 5)
power.quirks.acid.alma.description: Fling the mass of acid generated from Acidman at an opponent, turning their entire body into a projectile. [Primary]
death.attack.acid_corrosion.player: %1$s was dissolved by acid while fighting %2$s.
origin.quirks.blackwhip.name: Blackwhip
origin.quirks.blackwhip.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Blackwhip Quirk grants the user the ability to produce dark energy tendrils from any part of their body, which they can control freely. This Quirk is highly versatile, enabling both offensive and defensive capabilities.
power.quirks.blackwhip.move_selector.des:
The Move Selector allows players to choose which move to use. [Secondary]

The moves are assigned to slots as follows:

- Slot 1: Whip-Swing
- Slot 2: Tendril Pull
- Slot 3: Pinpoint Focus
power.quirks.blackwhip.whip_swing.name: Whip-Swing (Slot 1)
power.quirks.blackwhip.whip_swing.descri: Use Blackwhip's tendrils to grapple, slingshot, and swing off structures. [Primary]
power.quirks.blackwhip.tendril_pull.name: Tendril Pull (Slot 2)
power.quirks.blackwhip.tendril_pull.desc: The user can pull objects or individuals toward them with Blackwhip. Alternatively, they can pull themselves toward any targeted anchor point, enabling quick, multi-directional movement or object retrieval. [Primary]
power.quirks.blackwhip.pinpoint_focus.de: Launch a precise, high-velocity tendril toward a specific target, primarily as a striking attack. [Primary]
origin.quirks.fa_jin.name: Fa Jin
origin.quirks.fa_jin.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Fa Jin Quirk enables the user to store kinetic energy through repetitive movements and release it for explosive bursts of speed and power. This versatile ability can be used to augment movement, deliver powerful attacks, and perform high jumps, providing both offensive and utility advantages.
badge.quirks.fa_jin.move_selector: Pressing [%1$s] will go up, and [%2$s] + [%3$s] will go down.
power.quirks.fa_jin.move_selector.name: Move Selector
power.quirks.fa_jin.move_selector.descri:
The Move Selector lets the user switch between four different Fa Jin moves. [Secondary]

The moves are assigned to slots as follows:

- Slot 1: Speed Burst
- Slot 2: Energy Leap
- Slot 3: Power Strike
- Slot 4: Explosive Release
power.quirks.fa_jin.kinetic_energy.name: Kinetic Energy
power.quirks.fa_jin.kinetic_energy.descr:
Kinetic Energy is the primary resource associated with the Fa Jin Quirk. It represents the energy gathered through repetitive movements and is required to activate the Quirk's various abilities.

The kinetic energy resource is displayed as a bar with a maximum capacity of 50 units, with each Fa Jin move consuming a portion of this energy.

Once kinetic energy reaches 10 units, it begins to emit a red glow, growing brighter as more energy is accumulated.
power.quirks.fa_jin.kinetic_charge.name: Kinetic Charge
power.quirks.fa_jin.kinetic_charge.descr: Kinetic Charge is the process by which energy is stored by crouching repeatedly. This stored energy can later be used to activate different Fa Jin abilities.
power.quirks.fa_jin.speed_burst.name: Speed Burst (Slot 1)
power.quirks.fa_jin.speed_burst.descript: Release stored energy to boost your movement speed for a short period, propelling you forward at an incredible pace. Ideal for closing the distance quickly or dodging attacks. [Primary]
power.quirks.fa_jin.energy_leap.name: Energy Leap (Slot 2)
power.quirks.fa_jin.energy_leap.descript: Expend kinetic energy to launch yourself into the air, performing a powerful leap. The strength of the jump depends on the amount of stored energy, creating a shockwave that slightly pushes nearby entities upward. [Primary]
power.quirks.fa_jin.power_strike.name: Power Strike (Slot 3)
power.quirks.fa_jin.power_strike.descrip: Focus a burst of kinetic energy into a powerful attack, delivering a blow that knocks back enemies and deals increased damage. Surrounding entities are hit by the shockwave. [Primary]
power.quirks.fa_jin.explosive_release.de: Upon reaching maximum kinetic energy, unleash it all in an explosive blast. This powerful area-of-effect attack damages nearby enemies and sends them flying. [Primary]
origin.quirks.heal.name: Heal
origin.quirks.heal.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Heal Quirk grants the user the ability to heal themselves and others, accelerating natural recovery processes. However, the greater the amount of health restored, the more stamina the user expends. The Quirk works both on living creatures and the user themselves, with a focus on rapid, targeted healing at a personal cost.
power.quirks.heal.move_selector.name: Move Selector
power.quirks.heal.move_selector.descript: The Move Selector allows the user to toggle between Healing Kiss and Self-Heal. Slot 1 selects Healing Kiss, and Slot 2 selects Self-Heal. [Secondary]
power.quirks.heal.healing_kiss.name: Healing Kiss (Slot 1)
power.quirks.heal.healing_kiss.descripti:
The user channels their healing ability through a kiss-like gesture or action, focusing on an ally or mob. The amount of health recovered depends on the target's current health, with those more severely injured receiving stronger regeneration. However, the larger the health recovery, the more stamina the user loses, leading to temporary slowness and weakness effects. [Right-Click On Entity]

- §lHealth Recovery§r: Scales with target's current health.
- §lStamina Cost§r: The more health recovered, the greater the slowness and weakness effect on the user.
power.quirks.heal.self_heal.name: Self-Heal (Slot 2)
power.quirks.heal.self_heal.description:
Using their own healing ability, the user restores their health, with the same principles applying. The more health the user needs to recover, the greater the stamina cost. The move sacrifices speed and strength temporarily to regain health, leaving the user with slowness and weakness proportional to the health restored. [Primary]

- §lHealth Recovery§r: Based on user's current health.
- §lStamina Cost§r: As with Healing Kiss, greater health recovery results in more severe stamina depletion.
origin.quirks.severance.name: Severance
origin.quirks.severance.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

Grants the user the ability to create and manipulate slashes, generating powerful, controlled slicing attacks that can target individuals, objects, or multiple points in space.
power.quirks.severance.dismantle.name: Dismantle (Slot 1)
power.quirks.severance.dismantle.descrip: The default slashing attack that the user can launch at range or point-blank, used for slicing through obstacles or opponents. [Primary]
power.quirks.severance.cleave.name: Cleave (Slot 2)
power.quirks.severance.cleave.descriptio: This technique allows the user to adapt the intensity of the slash based on the toughness of the target's defenses. [Hit Entity]
power.quirks.severance.rend.name: Rend (Slot 3)
power.quirks.severance.rend.description: A specialized technique for inflicting internal damage, allowing the user to release a focused slash inside a target to rupture their internal structure. [Primary]
A rapid-fire technique that produces multiple slashes in quick succession, capable of focusing on one target or sweeping an area. [Primary]
power.quirks.severance.razor.name: Razor (Slot 5)
power.quirks.severance.razor.description: The ultimate sweeping slash that creates a massive arc, capable of cutting through obstacles and multiple targets in its path. [Primary]
death.attack.cleave.player: %1$s was sliced to pieces while fighting %2$s.
origin.quirks.smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
origin.quirks.smokescreen.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

Allows the user to generate a thick cloud of purple smoke from any part of their body. The smoke can be spread to cover a wide area, obscuring the vision of opponents and providing cover.
power.quirks.smokescreen.full_blast.name: Full Blast (Slot 1)
power.quirks.smokescreen.full_blast.desc: Emit a large amount of smoke to cover a wide area, enveloping the surroundings and blinding opponents. [Primary]
power.quirks.smokescreen.concealment_vei: Emits a controlled, layer of smoke at the user's anchor point for a few seconds, making it difficult for opponents to detect their movements. [Primary]
power.quirks.smokescreen.smoke_trail.des: Releases smoke in bursts as they move, creating a "smoke trail" effect. This makes it difficult for enemies to anticipate or follow the user's exact movements, allowing the user to escape or reposition during combat. [Primary]
power.quirks.smokescreen.breath_weapon.d: The user channels smoke through their respiratory system, emitting it directly from their mouth in controlled amounts. This move allows for precise smoke bursts in any direction the user faces, helpful for creating sudden, close-range blinds or throwing off a specific target's aim. [Primary]
power.quirks.smokescreen.vanish.name: Vanish (Slot 5)
power.quirks.smokescreen.vanish.descript: Blend with the smoke itself. Although it doesn't make the user invulnerable, it makes them exceedingly difficult to detect. [Primary]
origin.quirks.sloshed.name: Sloshed
origin.quirks.sloshed.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Sloshed Quirk emits an aura that disorients nearby individuals, causing them to feel off-balance and unable to move properly. The user can choose specific targets to affect and has the ability to hide from view while the Quirk is active.
power.quirks.sloshed.move_selector.name: Move Selector
power.quirks.sloshed.move_selector.descr:
The Move Selector allows players to toggle between the Sloshed moves. [Secondary]

The moves are assigned to slots as follows:

- Slot 1: Sloshed Aura
- Slot 2: Targeted Slosh
- Slot 3: Hide In Plain Sight
power.quirks.sloshed.sloshed_aura.name: Sloshed Aura (Slot 1)
power.quirks.sloshed.sloshed_aura.descri: Emits a disorienting aura that applies nausea to all nearby entities, creating a drunken-like effect within a 10-block radius. [Primary]
power.quirks.sloshed.targeted_slosh.name: Targeted Slosh (Slot 2)
power.quirks.sloshed.targeted_slosh.desc: Allows the user to select specific targets within 15 blocks, applying nausea and slowness effects for a short duration. Targeted entities are visibly outlined, making them easy to spot. [Primary]
power.quirks.sloshed.hide_in_plain_sight: Grants temporary invisibility to the user, preventing nearby entities within a 10-block range from rendering the user as long as the Sloshed Aura is active. [Primary]
